token_info.name: from the psychedelic (home)office | desktopsculpture rgb no 3 | 2021
token_info.description: In the era of new work, art, life and work become one in the hybrid home office on the desktop. The different layers of our existence are intertwined on the basis of microdosing, YouTube yoga, zoom chat, social networking and remote work. The piece is a combination of finest and pure html, css and javascript.
